description: This CSS file contains styles for managing themes (light and dark), layout, and design of a drawing canvas application's frontend. It includes variables for theme colors and styles for various elements such as the application header, links, and buttons.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling with center-aligned text and responsive background color based on theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header, including layout and responsive design properties.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application's logo, including animation properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links in the application, including color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning, transitions, and hover effects.
